# Regression analysis

## Imputation

```{r}
df_na_sum <- df %>%
  filter(wave != 1) %>%
  select(X2020likelyvote, biden, gendiscrim, apa.discrim.rona, usborn, edu, income, DEM, GOP, age, male, wave, korean, japanese) %>%
  map_dfr(~is.na(.) %>% mean())

df_na_sum
```

```{r}
imp <- mice(
  df %>%
    filter(wave != 1) %>%
    select(gendiscrim, apa.discrim.rona, usborn, edu, income, DEM, GOP, age, male, wave, korean, japanese),
    seed = 1234, # for reproducibility
    m = 5, # the number of imputations
    maxit = 10, # the max number of iterations 
    method = "pmm", # predictive mean method
    print = FALSE)

densityplot(imp, layout = c(1,2))

imputed <- mice::complete(imp)
```

```{r}
# Replace with the imputed values 
df$apa.discrim.rona[665:nrow(df)] <- 
imputed$apa.discrim.rona

df$gendiscrim[665:nrow(df)] <- 
imputed$gendiscrim

df$DEM[665:nrow(df)] <- 
imputed$DEM

df$GOP[665:nrow(df)] <- 
imputed$GOP

df$age[665:nrow(df)] <- 
imputed$age
```

## Likely to vote 

```{r}
df$proxy <- rep(subset(df, wave == 1)$gendiscrim, 3)
df$prior[df$proxy == 0.5] <- "Middle"
df$prior[df$proxy < 0.5] <- "Low"
df$prior[df$proxy > 0.5] <- "High"
```

```{r}
model.outs <- cal_model_outputs(df)
model.outs.low <- cal_model_outputs(df %>%
                                      filter(prior == "Low"))
model.outs.middle <- cal_model_outputs(df %>%
                                      filter(prior == "Middle"))
model.outs.high <- cal_model_outputs(df %>%
                                      filter(prior == "High"))
```

### Main 

```{r}
models <- list(

"Model 1" = lm(X2020likelyvote ~ gendiscrim + apa.discrim.rona, data = df),

"Model 2" = lm(X2020likelyvote ~ gendiscrim + apa.discrim.rona + usborn + edu + income + DEM + GOP + age + male + factor(wave), data = df),

"Model 3" = lm(X2020likelyvote ~ gendiscrim + apa.discrim.rona + usborn + edu + income + DEM + GOP + age + male + factor(wave) + korean + japanese, data = df),

"Model 4" = estimatr::lm_robust(X2020likelyvote ~ gendiscrim + apa.discrim.rona + usborn + edu + income + DEM + GOP + age + male + factor(wave) + korean + japanese, data = df))

modelsummary(models,
             fmt = 3,
             coef_omit = "Intercept",
             statistic = c("p = {p.value}"),
             stars = TRUE, 
             output = here("outputs", "reg_tb1.docx"),
             coef_rename = 
                 c("gendiscrim" = "General discrimination",
                   "apa.discrim.rona" = "COVID-19 discrimination",
                   "usborn" = "US born",
                   "edu" = "Education",
                   "income" = "Income",
                   "DEM" = "DEM",
                   "GOP" = "GOP",
                   "age" = "Age",
                   "male" = "Male",
                   "factor(wave)3" = "Wave3",
                   "korean" = "Korean",
                   "japanese" = "Japanese"))
```

```{r}
sense.out <- sensemakr(model = lm(X2020likelyvote ~ gendiscrim + apa.discrim.rona + usborn + edu + income + DEM + GOP + age + male + factor(wave) + korean + japanese, data = df),
          treatment = "apa.discrim.rona", 
          benchmark_covariates = "usborn",
          kd = 1:3, 
          ky = 1:3, 
          q = 1)

summary(sense.out)
```

### Sub

```{r}
model_outs_binded <- bind_rows(
    mutate(model.outs.low, group = "Low Discrimination Pre-COVID"),
    mutate(model.outs.middle, group = "Middle Discrimination Pre-COVID"),                  
    mutate(model.outs.high, group = "High Discrimination Pre-COVID"))

model_outs_binded %>%
    mutate(group = factor(group, levels = c("High Discrimination Pre-COVID", "Middle Discrimination Pre-COVID", "Low Discrimination Pre-COVID"))) %>%
  filter(!str_detect(term, "(Intercept)|sd")) %>%
  filter(model == "Within estimator (with robust standard errors)") %>%
  mutate(term = factor(term, levels = c("gendiscrim","apa.discrim.rona","usborn","edu","income","DEM","GOP","age","male","factor(wave)3","korean","japanese"))) %>% 
  mutate(term = fct_rev(term)) %>%
  mutate(term = recode(term, 
                   "gendiscrim" = "General discrimination",
                   "apa.discrim.rona" = "COVID-19 discrimination",
                   "usborn" = "US born",
                   "edu" = "Education",
                   "income" = "Income",
                   "DEM" = "Democratic Party",
                   "GOP" = "Republican Party",
                   "age" = "Age",
                   "male" = "Male",
                   "factor(wave)3" = "Wave3",
                   "korean" = "Korean",
                   "japanese" = "Japanese")) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = term, y = estimate, 
             ymax = conf.high, 
             ymin = conf.low)) +
    geom_pointrange() +
    coord_flip() +
    facet_wrap(~factor(group)) +
    geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dotted", color = "red", size = 1)  +
    labs(y = "Estimate",
         x = "",
         col = "Group") +
    ggrepel::geom_text_repel(aes(label = round(estimate, 2))) +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")

ggsave(here("outputs", "vote2020_sub_imputed.png"), width = 12)
```
